org.vertx.java.core.eventbus

Class Message<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.core.eventbus.Message<T>

  • public abstract class Message<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a message on the event bus.

    Author:
    Tim Fox

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      T body
      The body of the message
      java.lang.String replyAddress
      The reply address (if any)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reply()
      Same as reply(T message) but with an empty body
      void reply(T message)
      Reply to this message.
      abstract void reply(T message, Handler<Message<T>> replyHandler)
      The same as reply(T message) but you can specify handler for the reply - i.e.

    • Field Detail

      • body

        public T body
        The body of the message

      • replyAddress

        public java.lang.String replyAddress
        The reply address (if any)

    • Method Detail

      • reply

        public void reply()
        Same as reply(T message) but with an empty body

      • reply

        public void reply(T message)
        Reply to this message. If the message was sent specifying a reply handler, that handler will be called when it has received a reply. If the message wasn't sent specifying a receipt handler this method does nothing.

      • reply

        public abstract void reply(T message,
         Handler<Message<T>> replyHandler)
        The same as reply(T message) but you can specify handler for the reply - i.e. to receive the reply to the reply.
